code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with increased Kidney over 8 months. she is a white female retired aged 72 yrs. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 69 in, Weight 199 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
